title: Generative Principal Component Regression via Variational Inference
details: A Talbot, CJ Keller, DE Carlson, AV Kotlar - arXiv preprint arXiv:2409.02327, 2024
abstract: The ability to manipulate complex systems, such as the brain, to modify specific outcomes has far-reaching implications, particularly in the treatment of psychiatric disorders. One approach to designing appropriate manipulations is to target key …
